dataView.name: Slutförda supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'SLUTFÖRT' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT'

dataView.name: Aktiva supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND [Responsible Resource] <> ''

dataView.name: Förfallna supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND ([Case Status Code] = 'NY' OR [Case Status Code] = 'PÅGÅR') AND (DATEADD(day, 3, [Last Activity Date Time]) < GETDATE())

dataView.name: Förfaller idag
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND (CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, 3, [Last Activity Date Time])) = CONVERT(date, GETDATE()))

dataView.name: Mina pågående supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND ([Responsible Resource] = @myResourceNo OR [Assigned Resources] LIKE '%'+ @myResourceNo +'%')

dataView.name: Ej tilldelade supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND [Responsible Resource] = '' AND [Case Status Code] = 'NY'

dataView.name: Ej tilldelade supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND [Responsible Resource] = '' AND ([Case Status Code] = 'NY' OR [Case Status Code] = 'PÅGÅR')

dataView.name: Senaste aktiviteterna
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'SUPPORT' AND ([Last Activity Part] = 1 OR [Last Activity Part] = 2)

dataView.name: Inkomna supportärende
dataView.query: [Reason Code] = 'LÖP' AND ([Received Date] >= @fromDate AND [Received Date] <= @toDate)

dataView.name: Avslutade supportärende
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'SLUTFÖRT' AND [Reason Code] = 'LÖP' AND ([Actual Ending Date] >= @fromDate AND [Actual Ending Date] <= @toDate)

dataView.name: Mina ärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND ([Responsible Resource] = @myResourceNo OR [Assigned Resources] LIKE '%'+ @myResourceNo +'%')

dataView.name: Inkomna förfrågningar
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'TRATTEN' AND [Case Status Code] = 'FÖRFRÅGAN'

dataView.name: Offerter
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'TRATTEN' AND [Case Status Code] = 'OFFERT'

dataView.name: För tilldelning
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'TRATTEN' AND [Case Status Code] = 'ORDER'

dataView.name: Pågår
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'TRATTEN' AND ([Case Status Code] = 'PÅGÅR' OR [Case Status Code] = 'TESTKLAR')

dataView.name: Förfallna
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Reason Code] = 'TRATTEN' AND [Case Status Code] = 'PÅGÅR' AND [Promised Ending Date] <= GETDATE()

dataView.name: Slutförda
dataView.query: ([Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' OR [Case Type Code] = 'SLUTFÖRT') AND [Reason Code] = 'TRATTEN' AND ([Case Status Code] = 'GODKÄND' OR [Case Status Code] = 'AVSLUTAT')

dataView.name: Slutförda supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'SLUTFÖRT'

dataView.name: Aktiva supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND [Responsible Resource] <> ''

dataView.name: Förfallna supportärenden
dataView.query: [Case Type Code] = 'ÄRENDE' AND ([Case Status Code] = 'NY' OR [Case Status Code] = 'PÅGÅR') AND (DATEADD(day, 3, [Last Activity Date Time]) < GETDATE())
